vclaim: In a speech to U.S. military personnel, President Trump said if soldiers were real patriots, they wouldn't take a pay raise.
title: Did President Trump Say If Soldiers Were ‘Real Patriots,’ They Wouldn’t Take a Pay Raise?
subtitle: While speaking to U.S. troops about an upcoming military pay increase, Trump joked that he knew they didn't really want a raise because they're "very patriotic."
author: David Emery
